title: Big update this week on future of The Division, including Heartland and Resurgence
description: A reddish storm of Division games.

title: The balls on this guy: An author is suing Amazon and JRR Tolkien's grandson claiming they infringed on his Lord of the Rings fanfiction
description: The author of "The Fellowship Of The King" wants $250M because he says Amazon and The Tolkien Estate stole his ideas for The Rings of Power.

title: Google employees reportedly begged it not to release 'pathological liar' AI chatbot Bard
description: One employee called the chatbot "worse than useless."

title: Ubisoft's MouseTrap works, and console players are dancing on cheat hardware's grave
description: Input spoofers beware: Cheating sucks.

title: Dark and Darker devs apologize for buggy playtest, but I for one am glad I torrented it
description: It was a rocky test, for sure, but I had a grand time with the newest map.

title: Here's another e-waste crisis for the e-waste crisis pile: 'Chromebook churn'
description: Report shows that the lack of sustainability of Chromebooks provided for schools is hurting the environment.

title: Thank the dark ones: Cult of the Lamb is getting a big free DLC update this month
description: Relics of the Old Faith will enable you to outsource cooking, among many other new things.

title: Netflix will finally stop mailing people DVDs this year
description: No more little red envelopes.

title: The best-named game of the year finally has a release date, and it's just 4 months away
description: Jet Set Radio's indie successor has been in the works since 2020.

title: Where to find the Lock On Pistol in Fortnite
description: Drop in and snag a new Lock On Pistol to home in on your next victory royale.

title: Where to find Attack on Titan's ODM gear in Fortnite
description: Grab Eren Jaeger's iconic ODM gear to start grappling your way to victory royale.

title: OK things are getting silly now: This streamer beat Elden Ring with her brain
description: The Minds Between.

title: More people have played The Sims 4 than live in France
description: But which would win in a fight?

title: Rogue Trader shows off one of Warhammer 40K's most interesting locations for the first time in a videogame
description: Welcome to the Dark City.

title: Should you side with Berthram or the Captain in Wartales?
description: You'll get a Golden Key either way.

title: A fan favorite is returning as Darkest Dungeon 2's final launch character, and he's looking worse than ever
description: The Flagellant may have been flagellating a bit too much in the intervening years.

title: The Day Before announces a beta test and pledges a return to Steam
description: The devs seem confident the game will hit its November release date, but who can be sure at this point?

title: Sean 'Day9' Plott launches his own game studio to make a 'multiplayer PC strategy game'
description: Apparently his responsibilities as PC Gaming Show host weren't enough to keep him sufficiently busy

title: MSI's Afterburner graphics overclocking app gets its first proper update in years
description: All the latest GPUs supported, set your clock speeds to stun...

title: Age of Empires 2 gets some all-timer patch notes as it finally stops monks hiding in relics and dying when they drop them
description: A holy unforeseen problem.

title: PUBG developer's NFT metaverse platform is coming this year and still sounds like nonsense
description: Oh great.

title: You've got one week to try Modern Warfare 2's multiplayer for free
description: Activision is opening some (but not all) of the game's multiplayer modes up to the non-paying public.

title: Dev makes classic game free to celebrate release of remake, accidentally does it early and almost gives away the new one, before Valve saves the day
description: Desktop Dungeons certainly needed a rewind.

title: Techland wants to know who you'd like to play as in Dying Light 3
description: Even though it hasn't announced the sequel.

title: Asus ROG Strix Scar 16
description: Asus packs a fantastic core spec into a 16-inch gaming laptop, with a few compromises.

title: Gollum dev says it's charging for the precious Elvish-language DLC because it had to train voice actors in how to speak it
description: We wants the Sindarin.

title: Capcom promises the return of Resident Evil 2 and 3's vanished graphics and audio options
description: Sorry, sorry, I'm trying to undelete it.

title: Intel quietly ditches its Bitcoin mining chips
description: So long, Blockscale, we hardly knew ye.
